For four years I have been here:
Hobbies now only dreams.

Yajur Maker

Let's get the major stuff out of the way: 2nd year Bioengineering: Biosystems from Warren. Now for the juicy details. I love nature and the beach, improv comedy, and the Lakers (don't kill me). But all in all, I have slowly evolved a love for this campus, and a love for BioE. Come talk to me and we can splurge to world about wireless gizmoz and 21st century bionics cause if we won't, then who will?

Jessica Lam

I am a second year Biochemistry major in Sixth college. I am deeply in love with pizza and chocolate (not together though) and I run the best committee in BMES. Feel free to ask me any questions about BMES or bioengineering!

Michelle Ragsac

I'm a second year Bioengineering: Bioinformatics major from Sixth College with a passion for sketching and sleeping! I am currently working in the La Spada Lab at the Sanford Consortium and am researching the Huntington's Disease and Parkinson's Disease. Free free to contact me about BMES, Bioengineering, how to get involved, or anything else that may be on your mind!

Anurag Coramutla
